info.description:
This is a Shoppers Catalogue server.

[Learn about Swagger](http://swagger.io) or join the IRC channel `#swagger` on irc.freenode.net.

For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters
info.title: Shoppers OpenAPI

post.summary: Add a new product to the store

get.description: Returns a product when ID < 10.  ID > 10 or nonintegers will simulate API error conditions

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of product that needs to be fetched

post.summary: Updates a product in the store with form data

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of product that needs to be updated

post.description: Assign a product to the website

schema.description: will returned True if website successfully assigned to product

put.description: Assign a product to the website

schema.description: will returned True if website successfully assigned to product

delete.description: Remove the website assignment from the product by product sku

schema.description: will returned True if website successfully unassigned from product

filters.description: A list of filters in this group

framework-search-filter-group.description: Groups two or more filters together using a logical OR

framework-filter.description: Filter which can be used by any methods from service layer.

min_qty.description: Minimal quantity available for item status in stock

min_sale_qty.description: Minimum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart or NULL when there is no limitation

max_sale_qty.description: Maximum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart data wrapper

notify_stock_qty.description: Notify for Quantity Below data wrapper

link_url.description: Link url or null when type is 'file'

disabled.description: If gallery entry is hidden from product page

types.description: Gallery entry image types (thumbnail, image, small_image etc)

is_html_allowed_on_front.description: The HTML tags are allowed on the frontend

used_for_sort_by.description: It is used for sorting in product listing

is_filterable_in_search.description: It is used in search results layered navigation

is_used_in_grid.description: It is used in catalog product grid

is_visible_in_grid.description: It is visible in catalog product grid

is_filterable_in_grid.description: It is filterable in catalog product grid

apply_to.description: Apply to value for the element

is_searchable.description: The attribute can be used in Quick Search

is_visible_in_advanced_search.description: The attribute can be used in Advanced Search

is_comparable.description: The attribute can be compared on the frontend

is_used_for_promo_rules.description: The attribute can be used for promo rules

is_visible_on_front.description: The attribute is visible on the frontend

used_in_product_listing.description: The attribute can be used in product listing

options.description: Options of the attribute (key => value pairs for select)

is_user_defined.description: Current attribute has been defined by a user.

note.description: The note attribute for the element.
